audioText: J'ai pris un déjeuner léger aujourd'hui car j'ai rendez-vous chez le dentiste.
question: What kind of lunch did the speaker have today?
options: A light lunch because they have a dentist appointment
A heavy lunch because they have a dentist appointment
A light lunch because they have a doctor appointment
A heavy lunch because they have a doctor appointment
explanation: The text states 'J'ai pris un déjeuner léger aujourd'hui car j'ai rendez-vous chez le dentiste.' - I had a light lunch today because I have an appointment at the dentist. 'Léger' means 'light' (not heavy).
